methods.name: public void onLoadersChanged(@NonNull Resources resources, @NonNull List<ResourcesLoader> newLoader)
methods.comment:
* Updates the list of {@link ResourcesLoader ResourcesLoader(s)} that the {@code resources}
         * instance uses.

methods.name: public void onLoaderUpdated(@NonNull ResourcesLoader loader)
methods.comment:
* Refreshes the {@link AssetManager} of all {@link ResourcesImpl} that contain the
         * {@code loader} to apply any changes of the set of {@link ApkAssets}.
         *

methodNames: public void onLoadersChanged(@NonNull Resources resources, @NonNull List<ResourcesLoader> newLoader)
